Uses of Class
com.hedera.sdk.query.HederaQuery

  • Packages that use HederaQuery 
    Package Description
    com.hedera.sdk.node
    Provides classes to help manage communication with nodes in Hedera Hashgraph

    • Uses of HederaQuery in com.hedera.sdk.node

      Methods in com.hedera.sdk.node with parameters of type HederaQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.contractCallLocal​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to call a local smart contract function and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getAccountBalance​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get the balance of an account and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getAccountInfo​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get an account's information and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getAccountRecords​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get the records for an account and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getContractBySolidityId​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get a smart contract by its solidityID and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getContractByteCode​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get a smart contract's byte code and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getContractInfo​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get a smart contract's info and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getFileContents​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get file contents and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getFileInfo​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get file info and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getTransactionFastRecord​(HederaQuery query)
      Sends a query to a node to get a fast transaction record and returns the result of the request
      com.hederahashgraph.api.proto.java.Response HederaNode.getTransactionReceipt​(HederaQuery query)
